title: Delhi's power demand peaks at 6,780 MW; may reach 8,000 MW this summer: Discoms
description: With the day temperature spiralling up with each passing day, Delhi's power demand shot to 6,780 MW on Thursday -- the highest this summer so far, discom officials said. Realtime data from State Load Dispatch Centre (SLDC) showed that the peak power demand of the city was 6,780 MW at 3.26 PM on Thursday.
